link.title: Beaver Dam Jr./Sr. High School - News
Beaver Dam Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: On Monday, March 30, Arizona Governor Doug Ducey and Superintendent of Public Instruction Kathy Hoffman announced that school closures and remote learning would continue through the end of the school year. This extension follows the most updated guidance from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). SOCUSD will continue to provide the learning and nutrition as previously communicated.
